Module proj.ingsw.rj
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GUIManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUIManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, View
public class GUIManager extends Object implements UserInterface
Manages the reception of messages from the server and calls their needed implementation relatively to the scene
